# Linux Games Alt

> The specialized database for migrating players. Cross-referencing OS-locked software with community-verified Linux alternatives.

## Project Context
- **Name:** Linux Games Alt (formerly Combat Redirect)
- **Tech Stack:** Next.js 15, Tailwind CSS, Lucide/Remix Icons, Framer Motion.
- **Primary Mission:** Help Windows users find Linux-native or Proton-compatible alternatives for gaming and productivity software.

## Key Modules
- **Library:** A searchable database of Windows titles.
- **Comparison Engine:** Detailed side-by-side analysis of Windows software vs. Linux alternatives.
- **ProtonDB Integration:** Uses community telemetry to verify compatibility.
- **Nexus (Contact):** Community-driven support via Discord and GitHub.

## Technical Specifications
- **Design System:** Dark-themed, high-contrast (Zinc-950), "tactical" aesthetic with indigo/purple accents.
- **Framework:** React-based with focus on semantic HTML and SEO metadata.
- **Data Sourcing:** Steam Web API and community-driven verification.

## Legal & Privacy
- **Privacy:** Minimal telemetry, no third-party tracking, SSL/TLS secured.
- **Terms:** Educational/transformative metadata aggregation under Fair Use.
